Gatekeeper of the Abyss:
You sense an icy cold gaze fixed on you from a gigantic structure that seems somehow not quite alive nor dead. You must pass its judgment to enter the heart of the Seed of Infinity; if you wish to avoid it, you will be expelled outside the Seed of Infinity. However, the gaze isn't as painful as you feared. Has something happened to Ekimus?
Withstand the gaze
Say yes
